Title: Series: The Amarna Letters
Description: Clay cuneiform tablet; letter from Shuwardata to the king (of Egypt); 16 lines; part of reverse blank; complete.
Bibliographic references: Knudtzon, J A 1915a / Die El-Amarna Tafeln (282)
Bezold 1892a / The El-Amarna Tablets in the British Museum (68)
Barnett 1977a / Illustrations of Old Testament History (page 16 no. 6)
Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.176)
Sigrist M et al 2006a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, III
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
